text: @chriscowley - what does `uname - m` on those v7 platforms return?
can i assign a static ip for guest vm
<@U7ZBWDABW> - yes, you would use a "Reservation" to do that - but you do need to know "some info" about your Guest VM to assign an IP to it
for one server we can have mac address

the (minimal) UX doc we have is:
<http://provision.readthedocs.io/en/latest/doc/ui.html#reservations>
or - via the `drpcli` command line, you could do:
```echo '{
  "Addr": "1.2.3.4",
  "Available": true,
  "NextServer": "1.2.3.10",
  "Options": [],
  "ReadOnly": false,
  "Strategy": "MAC",
  "Token": "00:0c:3f:f1:13:d3"
}'  > my_reservation.json
drpcli reservations create -< my_reservation.json```
you could allow the machines to be discovered automatically by DRP - then convert an existing Lease to a static reservation - if you don't want to collect the MAC addrs of all of your Machines
is it going to be any impact in our excising DHCP server if we add these parameter

set next-server 192.168.19.79 â€“ Rackn server 
set filename " lpxelinux.0"
<@U7ZBWDABW> the system can also be set to reserve the ip after assignments.  So it keeps getting the same address after the first dhcp
